high_descs: Move to the right to face the right side of the dresser.
Pick the pen up from the dresser.
Move to the left and face the lamp on the dresser.
anns.task_desc: Pick up a pen and turn a lamp on.

high_descs: Make a left to face the dresser next to the wall.
Pick up the pen from the dresser.
Move to face the lamp on the dresser.
anns.task_desc: Pick up a pen to look at under a lit lamp.

high_descs: Move over to the right side of the dresser in front of you.
Pick up the pen to the right of the cell phone, on the dresser.
Move back over to the left side of the dresser.
Turn on the lamp in the back, left corner of the dresser.
